TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to enter details in mandatory fields of casualty form.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Casualty Tab
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Casualty Tab
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Casualty Tab

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Add New Button
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Add New Button
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Add New Button

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Injury Reference Number
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Injury Reference Number
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Injury Reference Number

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Injured Person's Name
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Injured Person's Name
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Injured Person's Name

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Vehicle Reference Number
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Vehicle Reference Number
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Vehicle Reference Number

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Save' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Save' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'Save button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on 'I Agree' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on 'I Agree' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able click on 'I Agree' button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify toast message 'The record was saved successfully'.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message 'The record was saved successfully'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message 'The record was saved successfully'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message 'The record was saved successfully'.
